overview:
Platformic’s Web Content Management Software enables non-technical users to build and manage better websites. Platformicâ€™s CMS leverages networked content, brings digital media products to market quickly, efficiently manages content editors, and improves social interactions, maximizing the value of any high volume website. Serving hundreds of millions of pages through a robust infrastructure; trusted and depended on by Fox, Comcast, Tribune and many others; Platformic delivers leading CMS solutions.

Achieve your creative vision in a shorter amount of time. Build your web presence with a constant flow of fresh content using social media tools and Platformicâ€™s search engine friendly system. Empower your non-technical staff to deliver and manage feature-rich, SEO-friendly websites in a fraction of the time it would take using other tools.

Edit content live. Platformicâ€™s user interface is overlaid on top of the actual live web page and only appears when a user is logged in as an admin. This allows the user to see modifications as they actually appear. Changes are also immediate. There is no need to wait for publishing or uploading files. This reduces the number of steps and amount of time it takes to maintain the site.

Capitalize on built-in social media solutions. Platformic introduces a whole new level of visitor engagement - SocialSiteTM. With the release of the SocialSite Social Media Platform, site administrators can easily integrate social networking and social media functions to any Platformic Enterprise website. Website visitors can create their own user profiles, comment, and recommend content to other users. Website visitors can also blog as well as add their own rich media content, including photo galleries and video.

Take advantage of out-of-the-box third party integrations. Platformic provides major regional sport networks with code-level-deep integrations with third party partners such as STATS for up-to-minute news and score updates and GIGYA for total social media packages.

Automatically detect mobile devices. In todayâ€™s mobile society, you need to ensure that your content is delivered consistently across all digital mediums. Website visitors are increasingly using their mobile devices to get the latest updates from their favorite websites using their iPhone, Blackberry, Droid or other popular devices. Platformicâ€™s technology automatically detects what mobile device your visitor is using and serves up a custom layout based on the device. The mobile site is self-managed. It ingests and then formats the content based what has been placed in the content library and associated feeds.

Leverage network content and drive brand engagement. Platformic’s extensive relationships with Content Delivery Networks (CDN), social media, and video management companies provide additional resources to deliver the most interactive, content-driven website that your brand deserves.

Because Platformic is delievered as a SaaS solution, content is easily shared across multiple sites. All it takes is a few simple configuration settings and networking of data is activated for any number of sites. No additional custom development is needed. To facilitate the replication of a corporate look and feel across the sites, Platformicâ€™s system template library is available to every Platformic site.

Networked sites can share feeds, media and advertising assets. Additionally, configuration settings and custom tool modules can be activated for the network or for each individual site. Each site controls the editing of content originating on that site. Networked sites can choose to make editable copies of articles that are no longer linked, thus keeping the original content intact, or they can choose to subscribe to linked copies that will be updated when the content owner revises the content.
